EmailTemplate.subject: FLAC initial submission on Personal Insolvency Bill 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Senators and Deputies,
FLAC issued an initial reaction to the Personal Insolvency Bill 2012 on its publication on 29 June 2012. As a further contribution to the discussion on the Bill, particularly now as it is going through Second Stage in the Dáil, FLAC has prepared a more detailed submission which is attached to this mail. We hope that the information contained here may be of interest to you or to colleagues. If you want any further information, or would like to discuss the matter further, please feel free to contact our Senior Policy Researcher, Paul Joyce or me.
Kind regards
Noeline
